section.title: Context

note.paragraph: This doc was written long after this app was created, thus explaining the past tense in language below.

section.paragraph: When this was created, the only way to add another app to lms/cms was to create the app in edx-platform repo. This was untenible due to already large size of edx-platform and adding another app increased the chance of further entanglement between the different apps.

section.title: Decision
section.paragraph: It was decided the ability to add django apps as plugins was necessary.

section.title: Consequences
section.paragraph: This would make it easier to move code for some critical/key apps outside of edx-platform and into their on repository. It would also make it easier to add further functionality into lms/cms without needing to change any code in edx-platform.
